programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Brandi and Marty have been together 5 years. Brandi's brother and her mother claim that Marty is being physically abusive and has been cheating. Plus, Jessica worries that Derwin is now cheating on her and claims that he's been abusive towards her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Maria is convinced that her son’s ex-girlfriend Amy and her new boyfriend Brian are abusing and neglecting her granddaughter. But Amy says that Maria is racist and angry because her granddaughter is being raised in a Hispanic household

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: A mom, addicted to PCP, repeatedly abuses her daughter. She even forced her daughter to lie about her abusive boyfriend just so he could get out of jail.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve I'm 14, I Need Your Help
programme.desc: 14 year old Rusty called our show because he says that he can no longer deal with his parent's constant fighting. He says that in the past they've hit each other, thrown appliances at each other and even bit him. His mother Mildred says that she and her husband Russell always fight and abuse each other because she suspects Russell of cheating.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: If I Don't Hit Her, She Doesn't Listen
programme.desc: Kelsey says her husband is abusing her. Malcolm believes that Kelsey has been cheating on him since the beginning and that their two kids may belong to another man. Plus, Carrie's boyfriend Chris thinks their child belongs to her ex.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Tacarra has been with Jaray for 5 years and raising two children together. But now she feels the passion has died and his coldness towards her has driven her crazy, and now she questions her marriage, and Jaray's honesty.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: First, Daniel has almost a dozen children with ten different women. While he admits to being their father, he refuses to care and provide for most of them. Then, Tadrianna strips and has sex for money and her mother, Kim, can't convince her to stop.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: After 10 years of searching, Brenda will reunite with her kids and address abuse allegations. Then, Cassidy wed Paul 5 days after she split with PJ, but is he molesting her and PJ’s son? Or is PJ the monster who burned their son’s feet?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Loretta and Joseph have been together for 2 years and have a young son together. She says that when she was pregnant, he punched and pulled her hair. She claims that she’s been faithful but Joseph isn’t convinced. Who’s telling the truth?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Did You Bite and Beat My Son?
programme.desc: Lorri is here because she believes that her grandson is being abused by his mother Alyssa and her ex-boyfriend Josh. She's here to find out the truth about whether or not they are really guilty of this abuse.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: 6 Kids Taken Away, but I Want More
programme.desc: Danielle’s children were taken out of her care after cops observed all 4 children, including her newborn, home alone. Her fifth and sixth babies were taken from her care, too. But she wants to prove that she could be a good mom!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Nathan currently has 4 children with 2 different women and is in a serious mountain of trouble. Jamie, his first baby's mother, is tired of his lasting neglect for their 3 kids and needs him to step up to the role.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Is it love, or fiction? 20-year-old Nick is desperate to get the love of his life back after one magical night of passion. Nick believes he's always been meant to be with Megan, even though he's only known her for 5 months. Megan however tells a very different tale, where Nick is imagining all the fate and passion between them. She claims they hardly know each other, and they've surely never slept together. Steve's not sure who's telling the truth, but the lie detector will yield the final results.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: According to Drew, the baby was bottle-fed gin and died. Shawn, the grieving mother, claims she had no prior knowledge of the bottle containing gin and believes it was tampered with, possibly by her own sister and friend. Who’s responsible?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: How Can You Still Love Him?
programme.desc: Joyia is desperate to keep her friend Stephanie from going back to her abusive boyfriend Scott. If Stephanie takes him back, Scott will continue to abuse her. But she still loves him! Will she have the strength to leave him?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Beat Them Up, What If They Pass?
programme.desc: Hannah is tired of Nick's crazy accusations, hacking into her computer and texting her friends pretending to be her. Then, Nicole says she's never cheated on her husband Robert. She also claims that the constant accusations caused her to miscarry.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Samantha believes that her 3 year old daughter was molested by her ex-boyfriend's brother, Chad. Chad denies sexually abusing the child and even took a voice stress test to prove his innocence. Now he wants to clear his name.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Wrote Dirty Letters to Her Mom?
programme.desc: Katie says her boyfriend, Brandon, is addicted to porn and has caught him sending dirty letters to other women including her mother! Then, 6 months into dating Crosby, Dayana cheated on him and now, he wants to know if their child is his!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Eric and Lisa are divorced and Eric is now dating Keri. Both Eric and Keri feel like Lisa is stalking them by sending him text messages and naked pictures. Then, Christopher has been unable to trust Olivia and thinks she may be cheating again.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Drugs and Sex Destroyed Our Family
programme.desc: Chamira left her family for prostitution, but then she sent her sister Latoya a pornographic video featuring minors. Emily received calls claiming that her fiancé Kevin was cheating on her and selling drugs. What will the lie detector tests say?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: At 12, Crystal dated 20 year old Matt and was pregnant at 13. He served 15 months in prison for criminal sexual assault on a minor and is a registered sex offender. Are they a product of inappropriate love or just misunderstood?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: She's Not Pregnant, It's A Trap
programme.desc: Elisha is claiming to be pregnant with John's baby, but Elisha's friend Brittany claims that she made up the pregnancy to keep John from breaking up with her. Then, during her pregnancy, Linzy contracted an STD and believes that Alex gave it to her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Gina separated from her husband Nate because she could never get along with his family. But Nate says that he's always had suspicions that their child wasn't really his. Then, Damond says that he doubts that he's the real father of Kendahl's child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Have Proof, You're Abusing Our Child
programme.desc: Robert says he believes that his daughters mother has been abusing her and he wants to prove the abuse and gain full custody of his daughter. Then, Casey claims her ex-boyfriend is abusive towards their kids and she wants him out of their lives.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Erica kicked her boyfriend Martez out of their house and out of her life. But she’s willing to give him a second chance if he proves that he didn’t molest her 4 year old son! Then, Christy’s ex Stephen refuses to admit that he fathered her son!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Keith has been accused of touching his 3-year-old son inappropriately by Crystal, the mother of his children, which he strongly denies. He says this is the result of her anger over an affair he had. But will the lie detector test prove him right?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Katrina is fed up with her boyfriend Ismael's abusive and controlling ways. Katrina says Ismael acts this way because he believes she has been cheating. Then, Christie has been married to Chris for 8 months and he already suspects her infidelity.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Where's That Fight For Your Son?
programme.desc: Colleen's son, Dalton has suffered with cancer for ten years. Patrick, the boy's father, left the picture when Dalton was only an infant, and after falling on hard times ended up homeless. But now he wants to be back in Dalton's life.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Daughter Tried to Poison Me
programme.desc: Thomazina’s boyfriend died a year ago and she thinks her daughter, Destiney slept with him! She also suspects Destiney tried to poison her with bleach! In December, Chris and Jesse’s baby died and they blame Jesse’s mother!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Angelica says John "checks her" for signs of cheating every time she comes home. She wants a lie detector test to prove she's been faithful! Then, Ashley she found out that her boyfriend, TJ, had cheated on her when she was 8 months pregnant.
